response:
Age and presentation favour inflammatory/demyelinating optic neuritis; antibody-mediated disorders must be considered; vascular, compressive, hereditary, and infectious/inflammatory causes are less likely but possible.

differential_diagnosis = ["Demyelinating optic neuritis (multiple sclerosis\u2013associated)", "MOG antibody\u2013associated disease (optic neuritis)", "Aquaporin-4 IgG neuromyelitis optica spectrum disorder (optic neuritis)", "Non-arteritic anterior ischemic optic neuropathy", "Compressive optic neuropathy (e.g., optic nerve sheath meningioma)", "Leber hereditary optic neuropathy", "Optic neuropathy due to sarcoidosis/syphilis/Lyme"]
